title.jp: Kitakubu Nyuubu Kibou / Inochi Mijikashi Kaere yo Otome / Hagitsukiryuu Shutsubotsu Chuui / Rouhi Shita Seishun: Priceless

synopsis: The Going Home Club goal is to find out how much fun they can have after school.  Despite the question of the club being recognized by the school, the girls are busy with their utterly off-topic discussions, today.

title.jp: Hototogisu wa Nakanai Tada no Shikabane no You Da / Joshiryoku Overdrive / Goukon Kunren

synopsis: The Going Home Club tries to compose a poem that describes themselves.  Karin brings cookies and tells the club about Home Ec Club.  The group plays the role of both boys and girls and practice for if they ever go to a social mixer.

title.jp: Fushinsha wo Korose! / Black Diary / Kawaii Ko ni wa Ame wo Ageyo / Kodoku no Ue ni mo Juugonen

synopsis: Botan has incredible powers of strength, but she claims her strength is mental, not physical.  Botan doesn’t use her powers in daily life, so she doesn’t know what to do with them.  Karin admires Botan and Claire finds Karin to be just too cute.

title.jp: Nettou!! Zenki Kyuugi Taikai / Moero!! Boukadamashii!! / Tekoire no Genri

synopsis: Sakura and Botan’s class face Claire’s class in a softball match.  The club discusses a fire evacuation drill from yesterday.  Botan states the reason for her training is in case they ever need to retool the show into a fighting show.

title.jp: Maou no Hinkaku / Bungaku no Susume / Urooboe Otogizoushi

synopsis: Botan believes the “Demon King,” from Schubert’s song, lacks the qualities of the real thing. Sakura talks about other good stories in their text book and other works of literature.

title.jp: Seishun wa Bakuhatsu Da / Guilty Judge / Hagishirabe-ryuu Shitennou

synopsis: The girls are playing video games when Sakura suggests they play a game that doesn’t require electricity.  A masked figure appears on the TV and announces that they will play “Judgement Game.”

title.jp: Fuujirareta Kotoba!! / Gekitou no Hate!! / Surprise Party

synopsis: Natsuki and Sakura decide to play Word Chain.  The Word Chain battle escalates from a pastime to a fierce competition.  The girls plan a Surprise Party for Natsuki’s birthday.

title.jp: Ane to Otouto / Street Poem / Ane to Tomodachi / Na mo Naki Mejirushi

synopsis: The club finds out Natsuki has a younger brother.  The girls pester Natsuki with questions about him.  The Going Home Club writes poems to be sold on the street.  The club members visit Natsuki to meet her younger brother.

title.jp: Shikou no Sentaku / Kareinaru Gasshuku / Hoshizora Imagination / Jinrui Saidai no Hatsumei wa Cooler... kara no Dead Freedom

synopsis: The girls go to a training camp for their summer vacation.  The girls spend the night at an inn.  The Going Home Club visits the pool and ponder how “free” freestyle swimming actually is.

title.jp: Hito wa Mikake ni Yore / Kengaku!! Hagishiraberyuu Kobujutsu / Joshi dake 5-nin Hyaku Monogatari / "Yuzuranai yo"

synopsis: The club heads to their sworn enemy’s dojo, Hagishirabe-ryuu, for training. The girls play “Telling of One-Hundred Tales” which involves extinguishing a candle for each ghost story. Sakura wants the club to join the relay at the Athletics Festival.

title.jp: Hana no Namae / Kousoku no Shibari / Owari Yokereba, Subete Yoshi

synopsis: It is her first day of high school, and Sakura is looking forward to a fun time.  Sakura wants the girls to think about the final episode: what they “should do,” and what do they “want to do.”  What kind of “final episode” does each girl want to see?

title.jp: Yomichigai / Bakusan tte Nani? / Mushigirai / Sessui / Taigigo / Toujou!! Ai Karin / Ai Karin no Gyakushuu / Yudan / Zettai Byoudou / Nakigoe / Chizu / Shomin no Aji / Buyuuden / Moshimo Ikai de Kuma Shitennou no Kigurumi no Kuma no Naka no Hito ga Super Joshiya-jin Dattara... / Urooboete mo Inai Ut

synopsis: Misreading / What's Tap-oom? / I Hate Bugs / Conserving Water / Antonyms / Debut!! Aikarin / Aikarin Strikes Back / Complacency / The Perfect Equal / Animal Sounds / Map / Taste of the Commoners / Heroic Tale, etc
